kpi.name: ser_msc156b

kpi_info.title: Usage attempts of supplementary services in the network
kpi_info.use: Indicates number of usage attempts of supplementary services in the network.
kpi_info.formula:
sum(MSCSSM_USAGE) ;where service_id = any supplementary service code (excluding teleservices and bearer services)


Counters from view(s):
RNS_PS_SERVI_{obj_agg}_{time_agg}

kpi.kpi_alias: Usage attempts of supplementary services in the network
